sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_YE162015 (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, FILE_APP_PAPR_DIV_CD, FILE_APP_PAPR_SBT_YN, FILE_APP_PAPR_SBT_DT, FILE_APP_PAPR_YETA_YN, FILE_APP_PAPR_YETA_DT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) VALUES (#dpobCd#, #yrtxBlggYr#, #clutSeptCd#, #systemkey#, #fileAppPaprDivCd#, #fileAppPaprSbtYn#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), #fileAppPaprYetaYn#, '', #kybdr#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_YE162015 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND FILE_APP_PAPR_DIV_CD = #fileAppPaprDivCd#
